title: Prepare for Weekly OAC Meeting
description: A PM needs to prepare the agenda and supporting documents for the weekly Owner-Architect-Contractor (OAC) meeting.

tasks.description: Generate a report of all open RFIs and submittals.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report listing all pending items is created.

tasks.description: Generate a two-week look-ahead schedule showing upcoming major activities.
Compile the reports into a single meeting package and distribute it to all OAC meeting attendees.
tasks.expected_outcome: A meeting package is created and sent to stakeholders.
